name: Followme.js
body:
followmejs-firebase =================== Followme.js using firebase on Google App Engine. [Demo](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8mRrbkbTZFc) If you wanna try this: * Open [Followme.js](http://followmejs.appspot.com/) in as many browsers and devices and possible. * Now open the [presentation remote](http://followmejs.appspot.com/r) in any browser or mobile and swipe or click next and every one will just follow you. Scan here to open this presentation remote in your mobile:

Just in case, if you are experiencing any glitches, someone else might be accessing the same presentation remote.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
